report_section.headline: What does
report_section.description:
Every missed lead, every slow response, every forgotten follow-up costs revenue.
How much is your business losing?

problem_identification.headline: Revenue
problem_identification.description: Leads come in but responses take too long. Your database is full but nobody reactivates it. Inquiries come in the evening but nobody answers. Every delay costs revenue.
stats: Speed to Lead: 78% of deals go to whoever responds in 5 minutes ‚Äì not 5 hours
Database Reactivation: 60-80% of your CRM contacts are inactive ‚Äì pure revenue opportunity lying dormant
24/7 Response: 35% of inquiries come outside business hours ‚Äì and get lost

solution_showcase.headline: Revenue
solution_showcase.description:
We design custom AI strategies for your business. WhatsApp, Instagram DMs, Voice AI ‚Äì one unified system with shared memory across all channels. Every conversation synced to your CRM, every workflow orchestrated from first contact to closed deal.
Built for your specific growth goals.
features: Omnichannel System: WhatsApp, Instagram, Voice AI with shared context + CRM
Guaranteed GDPR & nDSG compliant, highest data protection standards
ROI Guarantee: Measurable results or money back

product_demonstration.headline: Legal Tech made
product_demonstration.description: We're building a free tool for all families in Switzerland: Legally valid wills, understandable and secure. nDSG-compliant.
product_demonstration.mission_statement: Legata demonstrates our approach: Automate complex processes without losing humanity. Multi-channel communication (Voice, Chat, Web) connected with intelligent data processing. We build similar end-to-end systems for your business ‚Äì so you can scale.

founder_section.name: Chris Kobler
founder_section.title: Founder & AI Strategy Consultant
founder_section.quote: Most businesses hire to grow. I build systems that let you do 10x more with who you have. Simple rule: If it doesn't increase revenue or save real time, we don't build it.
founder_section.image_alt: Chris Kobler, Founder & AI Strategy Consultant

disclaimer.text: The author assumes no responsibility for the correctness, accuracy, timeliness, reliability and completeness of the information. Claims for damages against the author due to material or immaterial damage arising from access to or use or non-use of the published information, through misuse of the connection or through technical malfunctions are excluded. All offers are non-binding.

links_disclaimer.label: Disclaimer for links:
links_disclaimer.text: References and links to third-party websites are outside our area of responsibility. Any responsibility for such websites is disclaimed. Access to and use of such websites is at the user's own risk.

datenschutz.title: Privacy
datenschutz.subtitle: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: We are pleased about your interest in our website. The protection of your privacy is very important to us. Below we inform you in detail about how we handle your data.

responsible_entity.title: 1. Responsible Entity
responsible_entity.text: Responsible for data processing on this website within the meaning of the Federal Act on Data Protection (FADP) is:
responsible_entity.company_details:
Falx GmbH
Represented by: Christopher Kobler
Gussstrasse 6, 8180, B√ºlach
Switzerland
responsible_entity.contact_info:
Email:
Website: https://falx.ch

server_logs.title: 2. Collection of General Data and Information (Server Log Files)
server_logs.hosting_info: Our website is hosted by Netlify, Inc., 44 Montgomery Street, Suite 300, San Francisco, California 94104, USA (hereinafter "Netlify").
server_logs.data_collection: Each time our website is accessed, Netlify's server automatically collects a series of general data and information that is stored in log files. The following may be collected:
data_types: the browser types and versions used,
the operating system used by the accessing system,
the website from which an accessing system reaches our site (so-called referrers),
the sub-websites that are accessed on our website through an accessing system,
the date and time of access to the website,
the Internet service provider of the accessing system.
server_logs.purpose: This data cannot be assigned by us to specific persons. The collection of this data is technically necessary to display our website to you and to ensure its stability and security.

email_service.title: 3. Email Communication and Newsletter Services
email_service.description: For email communication and campaign management, we use various services:

resend.title: Resend
resend.description: Resend, Inc., 548 Market St PMB 98451, San Francisco, CA 94104-5401, USA. Data transmitted: Email address, name, message content. Purpose: Email sending and deliverability. Privacy: https://resend.com/privacy

google_workspace.title: Google Workspace
google_workspace.description: Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA. Data transmitted: Email addresses, message content, documents, business data. Purpose: Business communication, file management, collaboration. Privacy: https://policies.google.com/privacy

smartlead.title: Smartlead
smartlead.description: Smartlead Inc. Data transmitted: Email addresses, names, campaign content, engagement metrics. Purpose: Marketing automation, lead generation. Privacy: https://www.smartlead.ai/privacy-policy

instantly.description: Instantly.ai. Data transmitted: Email addresses, names, campaign content, response metrics. Purpose: Marketing automation, business communication. Privacy: https://instantly.ai/privacy-policy

infomaniak.description: Infomaniak Network SA, Rue Eug√®ne-Marziano 25, 1227 Geneva, Switzerland. Data transmitted: Domain information, email infrastructure data. Purpose: Domain management, email infrastructure. Privacy: https://www.infomaniak.com/en/legal/privacy-policy

analytics.title: 12. Web Analysis
analytics.description: We use Netlify Analytics on our website. This is a web analytics service from Netlify, Inc. Netlify Analytics does not use cookies and does not collect personal data that would allow direct identification of the user. Anonymized data such as the number of page views, referral sites and browsers used are analyzed to evaluate the use of our website and to compile reports on website activities. The collected IP addresses are anonymized.

data_security.title: 13. Data Security and Protection Measures
data_security.description: We take appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure or unauthorized access. When using third-party providers, we ensure their data protection compliance and use, where possible, services with servers in Switzerland or the EU, or with adequate data protection guarantees such as standard contractual clauses for data transfers to third countries.

data_retention.title: 14. Data Retention
data_retention.description: We store personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the respective purposes or as required by legal retention obligations. After the purpose ceases to apply, the data will be deleted unless its further retention is necessary for contract fulfillment or to comply with legal obligations.

user_rights.title: 15. Your Rights
user_rights.description: Within the framework of the applicable legal provisions, you have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, their origin and recipients and the purpose of data processing, as well as a right to correction, blocking or deletion of this data. You also have the right to withdraw consents given with effect for the future. For this as well as for further questions on the subject of personal data, you can contact us at any time at the address given in section 1.

policy_changes.title: 16. Changes to this Privacy Policy
policy_changes.description: We may adapt this privacy policy at any time without prior notice. The current version published on our website applies.
